text: the truth is that we made a mistake and
that's a that's very disappointing for
any journalist it's very disappointing
for me nobody likes to admit that they
made a mistake on October 27th
60 minutes ran an interview with a man
who identified himself as Morgan Jones
but whose real name is Dylan Davies
Davies told a harrowing story of the
fateful night when the US mission in
Benghazi was attacked one guy saw me he
just shouted I couldn't believe that
he'd seen me because it was so dark he
started walking towards me and as he was
coming closer as I got closer I just hit
him with a buck of the rifle in the face
and I went down there he dropped yeah
like a stone with his face smashed in
hmm yeah but his story may not have been
true just four days after 60 minutes
aired The Washington Post reported that
Davies had told his security firm that
he had spent most of that night and his
Benghazi beachside villa
then on Thursday the New York Times
reported that Davies told the same story
to the FBI
appearing Friday the reporter who
interviewed Davies says 60 minutes was
retracting the story we will apologize
to our viewers and we will correct the
record on our broadcast on Sunday night
